channel.title: Help starting a server
channel.description: Hey, If anyone know's how to create thier own server and is willing to help me out, could you please leave a post below in how to do this. Thanks, Aflxnhe1 [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] Please don't spam.[/center]

item.title: Help starting a server
item.dc:creator: @grafsteen grafsteen
item.description:
@grafsteen wrote:

hey i downloaded hamachi a long time ago… but it isnt working anymore… and i made a server but… i dunno how to put it up!!! :mad: :mad: couldt u please tell me in pm? thnx u r the best
[br][size=1]Posted on: March 16, 2007, 09:05:40 AM[/size][hr]post ffs post~~~!!![br][size=1]Posted on: March 16, 2007, 09:23:51 AM[/size][hr][quote=“x0 0wn, post:9, topic:66943”]I’ll make a small step by step “HAMACHI” guide for you.

  1. Get a server source, these can be found here http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,80379.0.html Thanks Melissa T for this.

  2. If you don’t have hamachi, download it from here www.hamachi.cc
    Then click download free… Then install.

  3. Download the latest JDK Java. Can be found at java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp

  4. Download a Rar Extracting program can be found at www.rarlab.com/download.htm

  5. Run Hamachi, then there will be a little triangle symbol with stars at each point in the bottom right corner.

  6. Click that then make a new network put in the NetWork Name. Eg.
    If your server was called ClickScape, I’d make the NetWork name ClickScape.
    Then Make a password

Note: Make multiple networks because they can become full. Eg. ClickScape1 ClickScape 2 etc…
Make sure if you have a password, it’s the same on all of them

  1. Go into your Server Source Documents. Then there should be a run server.
    Click that for it to run.

Note: I advise coding your server before release.

  1. Advertise your server and get people to come on!

~ If you have any problems report back here and I’ll help you ~

Cheers,
x0 0wn.

P.S Make sure you always have the server running and hamachi open when you want people to come on.[/quote]i done that all and i clicked on running bot but… nothing happens…only a black lil screen apears… ive made my normal ip a no-ip and still doesnt works… ffs that weird…

Read full topic

item.title: Help starting a server
item.dc:creator: @x0_0wn x0 0wn
item.description:
@x0_0wn wrote:

I’ll make a small step by step “HAMACHI” guide for you.

  1. Get a server source, these can be found here http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,80379.0.html Thanks Melissa T for this.

  2. If you don’t have hamachi, download it from here www.hamachi.cc
    Then click download free… Then install.

  3. Download the latest JDK Java. Can be found at java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp

  4. Download a Rar Extracting program can be found at www.rarlab.com/download.htm

  5. Run Hamachi, then there will be a little triangle symbol with stars at each point in the bottom right corner.

  6. Click that then make a new network put in the NetWork Name. Eg.
    If your server was called ClickScape, I’d make the NetWork name ClickScape.
    Then Make a password

Note: Make multiple networks because they can become full. Eg. ClickScape1 ClickScape 2 etc…
Make sure if you have a password, it’s the same on all of them

  1. Go into your Server Source Documents. Then there should be a run server.
    Click that for it to run.

Note: I advise coding your server before release.

  1. Advertise your server and get people to come on!

~ If you have any problems report back here and I’ll help you ~

Cheers,
x0 0wn.

P.S Make sure you always have the server running and hamachi open when you want people to come on.

Read full topic

item.title: Help starting a server
item.dc:creator: @breaking_the_bridge breaking the bridge
item.description:
@breaking_the_bridge wrote:

Example:

spam1.jpg941×124 

                          [img]http://www.smfboards.com/Themes2/default/images/icons/quick_lock.gif[/img][b][size=12pt]This  Topic Has Been Reported![/size][/b]![img]http://www.smfboards.com/Themes2/default/images/icons/quick_lock.gif[/img]

[size=10pt]Reason:[/size]Useless poll, so is counted as spam.
This topic has been Reported for Breaking Forum Rules

To make sure that your topics are not locked/reported in the Future, please do the following:
• Read the Moparisthebest.com Rules - Must be Followed when Posting Anywhere on both forums
• Read the RS2 Server Development/Help Rules - Must be Followed when posting in the RS2 Server Development/Help Forum
• Read the RS2 Server Download Rules - Must be Followed when Posting in the RS2 Server Download Section
• Read the RS2 Server Advertisement Rules - Must be followed when Posting in the Server Advertisment forum
• Read the RS2 Server Tutorial Rules - Must be Followed when Posting in the RS2 Server Tutorial Forum
• Read the Aryan Private Server Scripts Rules - Must be Followed when Posting in the Aryan Private Server Scripts Forum
• Read the RS Private Server Client Hacking Rules - Must be Followed when Posting in the Private Server Client Hacking Forum
• Read the MoparScape Questions Guide before Posting a Question - A lot of Frequently Asked Questions are already Answered

Also, please remember not to:
• Bump Posts
• Spam Posts
• Create Multiple Threads
• Post in the Wrong Forums

This will only Annoy Moderators and Other members, and there is a high Possibility your Threads wont be Looked at.

Read full topic

item.title: Help starting a server
item.dc:creator: @freezer_burn freezer burn
item.description:
@freezer_burn wrote:

            adam's private server making download list.
  1. first you need moparscape client. (moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,6915.0.html)

2.now you need hamachi. (hamachi.cc)

3.now you need a java enviroment jdk.5.0 (java.com) search for JDK

4,now you need winrar a extracting program for your source. (rarlab.com)

5.now you need a source and thats where winrar comes in. (megaupload.com/?d=HAZSN579)

  1. now you need mod tarahok’s perfect compiler to run and check for errors (moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,49747.0.html
    to use the perfect compiler make sure you extracted your source to your documents then find the file “compile” right click it
    then hit edit and paste what’s in mod tarahok’s compiler coding.

now if you think you are ready to start coding your own server try this blank one. Pimpscape

(megaupload.com/?d=16KZIJK5)

credits to phonecheck me and mod tarahok

Read full topic
